Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: moving this to low for 1.2, as it affects only the developers of Fabric.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Actually we have decided that we are not well set up for Experimental features yet. The v1.1 Experimental features will become production features in v1.2, and we will not introduce new ones. Code that is not ready will simply get held out as unmerged CRs, or disabled through other code/flag mechanisms. So this task is no longer needed. Marking invalid.
